column5: Hello all  I'm a long-time lurker.  I posted a couple times quite a few years ago under a different name but couldn't remember what it was to log back in.  Just wanted to say hi (again).  I'm in the process of buying my first fishing boat and found a number of the older threads extremely helpful.  This forum is a great resource.  I'm in the Grey-Bruce region.  I fish mostly inland lakes for bass and I do some stream fishing for trout as well.  Will be getting into the big water fishing once I have my boat.  Anyone in the area, feel free to drop me a line.  Always looking for fishing partners.  -Ben
Welcome to the board again we are glad you came back.    Art
I have a cottage this summer between Hanover and Walkerton perhaps we might fish together sometime.  EDit- Oh yeah Welcome back

I have a cottage this summer between Hanover and Walkerton perhaps we might fish together sometime.  EDit- Oh yeah Welcome back  Sounds great.  I know a lot of the inland lakes in the area pretty well.
Well you live in the right area for some great fishing!!! Welcome back.
Welcome back. I'm in the same area as you just waitin for spring and some steel! This winter can't be over soon enough
